course_title: Tradition and Diversity in Spanish History and Culture

sections.comments: Conservation and progress on the Iberian Peninsula, from the Middle Ages to the present. Includes the first modern European state and its diverse cultures. Full description: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/span321/

description: Conservation and progress on the Iberian Peninsula, from the Middle Ages to the present. Includes the first modern European state and its diverse cultures.
